title: deth
blurb: Top down roguelite shooter made in Unity. Survive as many rounds as possible! Made in 24 hours for UPGRADE's Game Jam! Worked in a team of three. I did the inventory system, UI, and textures.

imgs.alt: Main menu of our game. "Death" is spelled out using tiles.
A mine is rapidly homing in on the player.
A turret is shooting rapid bullets at the player.
